title: "Two Nights" Serif Font
content:
Hey.

I'm trying to find the name of the Font that is used for "Two Nights, colin potter." At first it resembled ITC Souvenir light but on closer inspection it isn't.

Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054439im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202015-02-20%20at%2012_5788.35.20.png)
author: psychictensions

comments.content: ITC [Korinna](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054439/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/korinna) by Edouard Benguiat and Victor Caruso
